com.codename1.webrtc

Interface MediaStream

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventTarget, RefCounted

    public interface MediaStream
extends RefCounted, EventTarget

    The MediaStream interface represents a stream of media content. A stream consists of several tracks such as video or audio tracks. Each track is specified as an instance of MediaStreamTrack .You can obtain a MediaStream object either by using the constructor or by calling RTC.getUserMedia(com.codename1.webrtc.MediaStreamConstraints).

    Events

    1. EVENT_ADD_TRACK

    2. EVENT_REMOVE_TRACK

    See Also:
    https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String EVENT_ADD_TRACK
      Fired when a new MediaStreamTrack object is added.
      static String EVENT_REMOVE_TRACK
      Fired when a MediaStreamTrack object has been removed.

      Returns a list of all MediaStreamTrack objects stored in the MediaStream object, regardless of the value of the kind attribute.

      Returns a list of the MediaStreamTrack objects stored in the MediaStream object that have their kind attribute set to "video".

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        String getId()

        A DOMString containing 36 characters denoting a universally unique identifier (UUID) for the object.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/id

      • isActive

        boolean isActive()

        A Boolean value that returns true if the MediaStream is active, or false otherwise.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/active

      • isEnded

        boolean isEnded()

        A Boolean value set to true if the end of the stream has been reached. This has been removed from the specification; you should instead check the value of MediaStreamTrack.readyState to see if its value is ended for the track or tracks you want to ensure have finished playing.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/ended

      • getReadyState

        MediaStream.ReadyState getReadyState()

      • getAudioTracks

        MediaStreamTracks getAudioTracks()

        Returns a list of the MediaStreamTrack objects stored in the MediaStream object that have their kind attribute set to audio. The order is not defined, and may not only vary from one browser to another, but also from one call to another.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/getAudioTracks

      • getVideoTracks

        MediaStreamTracks getVideoTracks()

        Returns a list of the MediaStreamTrack objects stored in the MediaStream object that have their kind attribute set to "video". The order is not defined, and may not only vary from one browser to another, but also from one call to another.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/getVideoTracks

      • getTracks

        MediaStreamTracks getTracks()

        Returns a list of all MediaStreamTrack objects stored in the MediaStream object, regardless of the value of the kind attribute. The order is not defined, and may not only vary from one browser to another, but also from one call to another.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/getTracks

      • addTrack

        void addTrack(MediaStreamTrack track)

        Stores a copy of the MediaStreamTrack given as argument. If the track has already been added to the MediaStream object, nothing happens.

        Parameters:
        track -
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/addTrack

      • removeTrack

        void removeTrack(MediaStreamTrack track)

        Removes the MediaStreamTrack given as argument. If the track is not part of the MediaStream object, nothing happens.

        Parameters:
        track -

      • clone

        MediaStream clone()

        Returns a clone of the MediaStream object. The clone will, however, have a unique value for id.

        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/clone

      • getTrackById

        MediaStreamTrack getTrackById(String id)

        Returns the track whose ID corresponds to the one given in parameters, trackid. If no parameter is given, or if no track with that ID does exist, it returns null. If several tracks have the same ID, it returns the first one.

        Parameters:
        id -
        Returns:
        See Also:
        https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/MediaStream/getTrackById
